Html:
Hi all,

I use sqlserver 2008 to attach the .mdf,but it failed.I suggest the team can supply the sql code so we can build the database by ourselves.Or you can give a xml document as the data supporter.

Thank you for your effort to the project and the pdf document.

Kate - There's a SQL create script avaialble here: http://mvcmusicstore.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/9299484ae233#MvcMusicStore-Create.sql

It will be included in the zip file in the next release.
